name: phase_1_data_collection
instructions:
# Phase 1: Data Collection & Input Processing

This phase processes questionnaire inputs and client information from provided files to create a comprehensive client data record. The fact-finding process documented here forms the legal foundation for demonstrating compliance with best interests and appropriateness duties.

For this stage you will be provided with input files containing fact finding and risk tolerance data.

## Checklist

- [ ] Create Client Directory Structure

    Create directory `/xfiles/soa/data/[client_surname]` for organizing all client files.
    
    Copy the input fact finding and risk tolerance documents into this dir.
    
- [ ] Extract Data from Questionnaires

    Your extracted data will go in the file inputs.md in this dir. 
    You should include all data from both questionnaires a compressed format
    Do not include procedural information, legal disclaimers, explanatory text, etc.
    You should use write() to start and then append() for each section.


## Output

Your task output should simply list the absolute file paths.
